minesweeper.domain

Class ScoreKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • minesweeper.domain.ScoreKeeper

  • public class ScoreKeeper
extends Object
    This object holds the current scores in TreeMaps and is used to check if the completion times are good enough to be recorded.
    Author:
    juri

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateTime

        public Integer evaluateTime(String time,
                   TreeMap<Integer,Score> scoreMap)
        Takes the finish time of the game as a string and checks if it has a place in the high scores.
        Parameters:
        time - String representation of time.
        scoreMap - current scoreMap
        Returns:
        returns the position of the new score or 11 if the time was not enough to make it into the high score list.

      • updateScores

        public void updateScores()
        Updates all the Maps containing scores.
